blocks.name: snstrvtxval
blocks.content: The set of vertices of a graph without edges represented as an extensible structure with vertices as base set and no indexed edges. See ~ vtxvalsnop for the (degenerate) case where ` V = ( Base `` ndx ) ` . (Contributed by AV, 23-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm snstrvtxval(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c1), c0))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wceq(c1, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cfv(cvtx, c1), c0, cif(cfv(c1st, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), wcel(c1, cxp(universe, universe))), cfv(cbs, c1), wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)))
  iffalsed(cfv(c1st, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)), wcel(c1, cxp(universe, universe)))
  sylbi(wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)), wn(wcel(c1, cxp(universe, universe))), wne(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0))
  necom(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx))
  funsndifnop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0, c1)
  fvex(cbs, cnx)
  a1i(wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c1), cif(cfv(c1st, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), wcel(c1, cxp(universe, universe)))))
  vtxval(c1)
  mp1i(wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c0, universe))
  1strbas(c0, universe, c1)
}

blocks.name: snstriedgval
blocks.content: The set of indexed edges of a graph without edges represented as an extensible structure with vertices as base set and no indexed edges. See ~ iedgvalsnop for the (degenerate) case where ` V = ( Base `` ndx ) ` . (Contributed by AV, 24-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm snstriedgval(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c1), emptycls))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wceq(c1, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(ciedg, c1), emptycls, cif(cfv(c2nd, c1), cfv(cedgf, c1), wcel(c1, cxp(universe, universe))), cfv(cedgf, c1), wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)))
  a1i(wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c1), cif(cfv(c2nd, c1), cfv(cedgf, c1), wcel(c1, cxp(universe, universe)))))
  iedgval(c1)
  iffalsed(cfv(c2nd, c1), cfv(cedgf, c1), wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)), wcel(c1, cxp(universe, universe)))
  sylbi(wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)), wn(wcel(c1, cxp(universe, universe))), wne(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0))
  necom(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx))
  funsndifnop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0, c1)
  fvex(cbs, cnx)
  syl5eq(cfv(cedgf, c1), emptycls, cfv(c1, cfv(cedgf, cnx)), wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)))
  mp2b(wceq(cfv(cedgf, c1), cfv(c1, cfv(cedgf, cnx))), wceq(c1, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0))), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl5eqel(c1, universe, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)), wceq(c1, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0))))
  a1i(wceq(c1, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0))), wcel(csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)), universe))
  snex(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0))
  edgfndxid(c1, universe)
  syl(wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)), wceq(cfv(c1, cfv(cedgf, cnx)), emptycls), wn(wcel(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cdm(c1))))
  neleqtrrd(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cdm(c1), csn(cfv(cbs, cnx)), wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)))
  sylnibr(wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)), wcel(cfv(cedgf, cnx), csn(cfv(cbs, cnx))), wceq(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cfv(cbs, cnx)))
  a1i(wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)), wn(wceq(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cfv(cbs, cnx))))
  nesymi(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cfv(cbs, cnx))
  slotsbaseefdif()
  elsn(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cfv(cbs, cnx))
  fvex(cedgf, cnx)
  syl5eq(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(cbs, cnx)), cdm(csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0))), wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)))
  dmeqi(c1, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)))
  mp1i(wne(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx)), wceq(cdm(csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0))), csn(cfv(cbs, cnx))), wcel(c0, universe))
  dmsnopg(c0, universe, cfv(cbs, cnx))
  ndmfv(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm snstriedgval(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ≠(Base ` ndx)→(iEdg ` c1)= ∅)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c1 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > }
} = {
  3eqtrd((iEdg ` c1), emptycls, if(c1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌),(2nd ` c1),(.ef ` c1)), (.ef ` c1), c0 ≠(Base ` ndx))
  a1i(c0 ≠(Base ` ndx), (iEdg ` c1)= if(c1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌),(2nd ` c1),(.ef ` c1)))
  iedgval(c1)
  iffalsed((2nd ` c1), (.ef ` c1), c0 ≠(Base ` ndx), c1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  sylbi(c0 ≠(Base ` ndx), ¬ c1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), (Base ` ndx)≠ c0)
  necom(c0, (Base ` ndx))
  funsndifnop((Base ` ndx), c0, c1)
  fvex(cbs, cnx)
  syl5eq((.ef ` c1), emptycls, (c1 `(.ef ` ndx)), c0 ≠(Base ` ndx))
  mp2b((.ef ` c1)=(c1 `(.ef ` ndx)), c1 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > }, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl5eqel(c1, universe, { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > }, c1 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > })
  a1i(c1 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > }, { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > } ∈ 𝕌)
  snex(<(Base ` ndx), c0 >)
  edgfndxid(c1, universe)
  syl(c0 ≠(Base ` ndx), (c1 `(.ef ` ndx))= ∅, ¬(.ef ` ndx)∈ dom(c1))
  neleqtrrd((.ef ` ndx), dom(c1), {(Base ` ndx)}, c0 ≠(Base ` ndx))
  sylnibr(c0 ≠(Base ` ndx), (.ef ` ndx)∈ {(Base ` ndx)}, (.ef ` ndx)=(Base ` ndx))
  a1i(c0 ≠(Base ` ndx), ¬(.ef ` ndx)=(Base ` ndx))
  nesymi((.ef ` ndx), (Base ` ndx))
  slotsbaseefdif()
  elsn((.ef ` ndx), (Base ` ndx))
  fvex(cedgf, cnx)
  syl5eq(dom(c1), {(Base ` ndx)}, dom({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 > }), c0 ≠(Base ` ndx))
  dmeqi(c1, { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > })
  mp1i(c0 ≠(Base ` ndx), dom({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 > })= {(Base ` ndx)}, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  dmsnopg(c0, universe, (Base ` ndx))
  ndmfv((.ef ` ndx), c1)
}
